entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trimmed winforms app crashes #96516
  • Different JavaScript Objects are wrapped by the same JSObject instance. #96512
  • Native AOT in .NET 9 #96511
    9.0.0
  • Support not using Win32 APIs that aren't allowed for Microsoft Store UWP apps & games on NativeAOT #96510
  • .Net 6 API in failing at start up post this upgrade to VS2022 17.8. Getting error "Operation is not supported on this platform." #96507
    9.0.0
  • Arm64 late disassembler fails to disassemble some unit test instructions #96506
    9.0.0
  • Property support in `[GeneratedComInterface]` interfaces #96502
  • Executable published for osx-arm64 does not work on the new Macs #96501
  • ILLink: KeyNotFoundException in compiler generated code for not finding a type #96495
  • .net 8, HttpClient, adding ssl cert after first use, the cert does not get used #96494
  • [wasm] Failing test `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay_ContinueWith` #96493
  • `System.Console.ReadKey` is lame on Windows; brilliant on Linux #96490
  • Is there a way to Request the "Profiler" if one is attached to the CLR to request a "Flush" or harvest from Managed code? #96485
  • [Test Failure] Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #96484
  • System.Text.Json.Serealization (JsonPropertyName) is not converting json properties to dto classes #96482
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.WinHttpHandlerTest.SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #96481
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 IFMA Intrinsics #96476
  • [NETSDKE2E] CoreFX symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols on MacOS #96475
  • Potential redundant field in MethodDesc #96474
  • Adjustment to RichDebug format and standardizing it for external profiler use #96473
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex #96496
  • PR_SET_PDEATHSIG support on linux #96470
  • AssemblyBuilderImpl.DefinePersistedAssembly has trouble with ReadOnlySpan methods #96469
    9.0.0

Closed

  • FileNotFoundException resource files is slowing things down ridiculously #36053
    9.0.0
  • Performance regression of System.MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual measured on .NET 8.0 Intel Core i7-7700HQ #95346
  • TypeTests.Get, JitInfoTests, and EnumTests Fail with TestReadyToRun #94189
    9.0.0
  • ARM64 unwinder missing support for pac_sign_lr #90500
    9.0.0
  • System.Data.Odbc/OleDb - DbProviderFactories.GetFactory(connection) fails #96278
    9.0.0
  • `RequestReJITWithInliners` can cause an access violation and crash the application #88924
    6.0.x
  • Access Violation starting with .NET 8.0.0 when debugging console application with Visual Studio on Windows x64 #96322
    8.0.x
  • Add RIDs for Alpine 3.19 #96155
  • Mixed Assembly Loading in .NET #96110
  • Networking certificate test failures #91705
  • Replacing runtime framework assembly works in C# but not in C++/CLI #95607
  • Failing test - `HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker.RequestDuration_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded` #93627
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadWrite_Random_Success #86565
    9.0.0
  • certificate validation not working properly in .Net Android #95506
  • .NET 8.0 ChannelClosedException using gRPC (Http2Connection) #95621
    8.0.x
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.IntPtrGenericTensorPrimitives.MinMagnitude_TwoTensors_SpecialValues #96471
  • [6.0] An attempt was made to transition a task to a final state when it had already completed. #95158
  • [libraries-jitstress] Failures in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.*Generic* #96464
    9.0.0
  • Thanks @Jericho for the feedback. Please re-open if this re-appears. #95691

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix generic signature issue when calling non generic method of closed generic type #96517
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][amd64] Fix Vector128 relational comparison API's for uint type #96515
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #96514
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • decommit regions on huge free list in aggressive mode #96513
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Build Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #96509
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Disable test when running under GCStress #96508
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Refactor exception trackers #96505
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix CaptureContextFromParameter and SealJSImportCapturing #96504
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix source_file bug in mono_ppdb_lookup_location_internal #96497
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • add SerialStream support for MacCatalyst #96492
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • STJ: set initial capacity of JsonObject if known (#96417) #96486
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove checks on loop number in fgCanCompactBlocks #96479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove compaction renumbering quirk #96478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove loop unrolling quirks #96477
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Document JitDisasm and JitLateDisasm #96468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary string allocations in hosting layer #95801
    area-Host
  • Fix JitInfo tests with ReadyToRun #96423
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Further clean up loop alignment placement #95917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Override DbConnection.DbProviderFactory for ODBC/OleDB #96290
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • [release/8.0-staging] Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96375
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Add File.Exists check to LoadFromResolveHandler #96432
    area-System.Reflection
  • Ensure small counts are properly handled for sizeof(T) == 8 #96463
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96055
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96053
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [QUIC] Disable QUIC tests on CLR stress tests #96392
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix idle HTTP/2 connection KeepAliveTimeout teardown #96158
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Fix formatting after late disasm PR #96480
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Port loop unrolling to new loop representation #96454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refine usage of late disassembler and emitter unit tests #96467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn when building C++/CLI tests not in a command prompt and don't try copying the files if we aren't in one #96465
    area-Interop-coreclr

Updated

  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Home float parameters before integer parameters #96439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96261
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change #96270
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log2 to Vector64/128/256/512 #96455
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] ILLink: Allow interface methods to not have newslot #95571
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96220
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Recover from failed OCSP download. #96448
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests #96243
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Experiment: Minopts lsra #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove defunct netfx tests #96435
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove support for self-contained output during `dotnet build` #37780
  • [NETSDKE2E] CoreFX symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols on MacOS #37762

Closed

  • PublishTrimmed should imply self-contained #30104

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Compute SdkAnalysisProperty at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37751
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix sln add for duplicate projects under different paths with same root #37542
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add escape hatch for publishing with SelfContained=true, but no RuntimeIdentifier. #37368
    Area-External, Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

Updated

  • Add comment #37753
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected error message from collection expression cast #71490
    17.10
  • Crash in params with interpolated string handler arguments #71488
  • Short circuiting operations incorrectly converted to non-short circuiting version when reading from a ref #71487
  • Respect severity from 'option_name = option_value:severity' editorconfig entries in IDE features #71483
    17.10

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34504.92 #71494
  • Analysis results paths are pointing to generated code instead of the Razor files #71449
    17.9
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.Lightup.ISmartRenameSessionFactoryWrapper' threw an exception #71410
  • Localization issues with compiler tests #67743
    17.9
  • Cannot pass 'null' as argument to 'T?' #71485

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix semantic model for target typed collection expression elements #71496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Port][Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions (#71478) #71495
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific error (if any) for explicit cast failure #71492
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2346062 #71491
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't hard select promoted default item if there's filter text #71480
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix accessibility checks when getting completion lists in patterns #71489
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Inline Rename] Cosmetic improvements to Rename Suggestions #71478
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Change MapCode protocol to match it's form in VS #71415
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Respect line directives in SARIF logger #71454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable 'use collection expression' when it would introduce an allocation #71482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Upgrade BCL assembly to 8.0.0 #71444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix snippet change text #71473
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to new version of NuGetAuthenticate task as v0 is being deprecated #71479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • PR feedback and cleanup after solution-state/compilation-state refactoring. #71389
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cleanup code with patterns #71472
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Params Collections - Adjust binding in presence of dynamic arguments #71421
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Params Collections: misc chanages #71423
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Semantic snippets: fix inline statement snippets in a "qualified name" edge case #71246
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fixes nested code actions in LSP bug #71456
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix nested code actions in VSCode #71457
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce scope of banned API suppressions to only what is necessary #70303
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71256
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR Upgrade to Redis Backplane fails with Send Loop Error #53156
  • ASP.NET Core over HTTP.SYS changes the redirect URL in 302 response to HTTPS protocol #53149
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mapaction, multiple_queries #53148
  • Modernize the Blazor Web template #53142
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET8 routing with UrlEncode(url) in parameter does not work #53138
  • NullDisplayTextResourceType is not taken into account by DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider. #53137
  • Blazor custom router is broken on .Net 8 #53135
  • ControllerFeatureProvider throws System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: "Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Could not load type 'Npgsql.Internal.TypeHandling.TypeHandlerResolverFactory' #53134
  • Dotnet 8.0 issue on app with mixed razor and blazor #53133
  • NavigationManager.NavigateToLogout() stuck on authentication/logout-callback after upgrade to dotnet 8 #53131
  • Routing issues or just by design? #53130
  • Blazor server: Invoke `EditForm` submit POST reload page to handle server logic with `HttpContext` after editing form in interactive mode. #53129
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json #53128
  • API converts SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE to screaminG_SNAKE_CASE #53126
  • install .net8.0 aot 'Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Filters.AddResponseHeadersFilter' could not be located #53125

Closed

  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #51915
  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #52592
  • RequestDelegateGenerator generate incorrect code if use with fully specify typed Results #52989
    8.0.x
  • Perf improvement: single_query #53085
  • Perf improvement: updates #53127
  • BWA/WASM templates embrace H1 top-level headers but RC template doesn't #49570
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Header and Footer Inconsistencies (scrolling and transparency issues) #50121
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Improve new Blazor project templates. #50927
    .NET 9 Planning
  • New UI template for Blazor Web App #51326
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor g11n/i18n support #51181
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Update the .NET 8 Blazor Web App project template to show client-server communication over HTTP, with shared models, for Blazor WebAssembly #52474
    .NET 9 Planning
  • HttpRequest.QueryString not correctly build after decoding #53110
  • .NET 8 - app_offline.htm is not correctly stopping site #52307
    8.0.2
  • Blazor Debugger does not support comma separated NO_PROXY value #52475
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor WebForms #53124
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #53105
  • Routing source generation for Native AOT not working well with generic constraints and nullable reference types #51866
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor WebForms #53123
  • Allow us to Disable "data-enhance-nav" for whole site globally in Blazor App. #52995
  • Blazor Web App when in debug mode is OK but when pushed to server then problem #53029

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Always install node in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove _GetPackageVersionInfo from Npm.Workspace.nodeproj #53153
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting.csproj for _GetPackageVersionInfo #53152
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Centralize our JS build setup #53150
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Accept an HTML encoder instance from DI if available #53140
    area-blazor
  • String formatting improvements. #53122
    area-dataprotection

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger #53147
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.2
  • Use macOS-12 in CI #53145
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Bump karma-sauce-launcher and saucelabs versions #53116
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix handling of default values for struct types in RDG #53047
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.2
  • fix: ignore proxy for local address supports comma separated values #53132
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `76bb2af` to `dddb219` #53079
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.27
  • [release/8.0] Fix deserializing null properties to Protobuf types #52468
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix reading null struct property value in gRPC JSON transcoding #52469
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix auto import of proto files when gRPC JSON transcoding is a transitive reference #52470
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-hosting, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix app_offline detection for some OSes #52810
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.2
  • Fix up formatting for generic types with nullable args #53049
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Update other packages to bundle with rollup #53117
    area-blazor
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Avoid call to ASCII.GetBytes during HostFilteringMiddleware static initialization #52978
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Update Login.razor to pass ApplicationUser to SignInManager instead o… #52984
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • fix: Added missing AddOptions() to AddLocalization. #53016
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash detection in build script is off-by-one #19703
  • Picker goes into infinite loop when updating ItemsSource ObservableCollection during SelectedIndex update #19702
  • Unexpected exception from VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements #19701
  • Caught exception in StartHotReloadAsync at 186: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'path1') #19699
  • Calls to retrieve large byte array in MAUI Android app never completes #19698
  • Entry Plain keyboard still autocorrects when using Microsoft SwiftKey #19696
  • FontImage not working as an IconImageSource for ToolbarItem on Windows. Regular image format works. #19695
  • [Testing] Push Rachel's Recipes and/or our manual testing app to the store #19692
    Backlog
  • Button VisualStates do not work #19690
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: 'setSpan ( ... ) ends beyond length #19689
  • iOS Memory issue #19686

Closed

  • [macOS] `PointerEventArgs.GetPosition(relativeTo: view)` does not give correct values (absolute instead of relative ones?) #19329
    Backlog
  • A wait cursor is shown when a Maui application has been loaded in Windows #19661
  • Exception Occurs When Updating the Text of a Label Using Task.Run() #19666
  • I would like to know if Microsoft has abandoned MAUI? Is it still worthwhile for me to continue learning and using MAUI #19687
  • [Bug]: Android release crash, debug work as normal #14653

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19700
  • [Windows] Fix verification of test count in CI #19697

Merged

  • [net9.0] Enable trimming windows #19680
  • Stable version #19693
  • Modify `FlyoutHeaderAdaptsToMinimumHeight` test to work better on CI #19685
    area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [net9.0] Enable tizen #19679
  • Clean up / Linq removal #19260
    area/animation 🎬, community ✨
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    community ✨
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Add benchmarking class for PropertyMapper extensions #18660
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Added optional ReceiveSms permission #19659
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API request failed application stops automatically #32723
  • Shadow Concurrency Token of owned Type in TPH Hierarchy is not set automatically. #32720
  • Allow passing entity type instances to ExecuteUpdate #32719
  • Mapping nullable DB conlumns to non-nullable Entity properties #32718
  • Type converters, comparers etc. cannot be supported if they contain expressions incompatible with expresion tree #32717
  • Make LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator more resilient to multiple declaration of the same variable in nested scopes #32716

Closed

  • ExecuteUpdate Produce Wrong Query when used with window function and join #31984
  • String comparison fails when using const and compiled Models. #32617
    8.0.x
  • Inconsistent behavior related to relationship cycle #32422
    8.0.2
  • Migration rollback resulting in weird behavior in Snapshot file #32555
    9.0.0
  • SqliteException "no such column : rX.value" when ordering on subquery value in combination with a "where contains" when upgrading from 7 to 8.0.0-rc.2.23480.1 #32234
    8.0.2
  • Using new[] in select query gives exception .NET 8 #32331
    8.0.2
  • Adding EF.Constant to prevent parameterization in query #31552
    8.0.2
  • Incorrect parameter rewriting for string StartsWith/EndsWith/Contains #32432
    8.0.2
  • Did Contains stop working on empty list in EF Core 8? #32375
    8.0.2
  • DB Context pooling with proxies resulting in memory issues in 8.0 RC2 #32267
    8.0.2
  • Cosmos provider v7.0.14 and v8.0.0 breaks previous OwnsMany behaviour #32410
    8.0.2
  • EF Core Cosmos 7.0.13 => 7.0.14 Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'derivedType') #32363
    8.0.2
  • LINQ "Contains" generates SQL with wrong char length #32325
    8.0.2
  • New OpenJSON expression to SQL translation breaks aggregates on subquery with 'Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery' exception #32374
    8.0.2
  • Lazy loader throwing invalid operation exceptions #32390
    8.0.2
  • Migrations bug when creating stored procedure with GOTO statement #32457
    8.0.2
  • Constructor not found for type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.Internal.NullableClassCurrentProviderValueComparer #32411
    8.0.2
  • Property conversions are lost on base type is subtype is registered to model afterwards after upgrade to EFCore 8 #32430
    8.0.x
  • Linq Code no longer working since upgrading to .Net 8.0. Same query works fine in 7.0 #32532
  • Use C# 11 raw string literals #28260
    8.0.0
  • Dotnet scaffold fails without error when Default Schema is missing. #30845
  • InMemoryDatabase Not Respecting Schema: Shared Table Content Across Contexts #32564
  • Column mapping is changed, if table splitting is introduced. #32521
  • Make sure the migrations history table is created cleanly #16026
  • "Could not load assembly 'Test'. Ensure it is referenced by the startup project 'Test'" error while adding migration for x86 .NET 5.0-preview7 project with dotnet ef 5.0-rc1 #22594
  • RevEng: Foreign key annotations are not printed if it has default facets for core #25542
  • ArgumentOutOfRange exception with custom IMigrationsIdGenerator #27502

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix DbContextPoolingTest Concurrency_test #32722
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #32721
  • Fix complex assignment operator handling in LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator #32715

Merged

  • Break up KeyDiscoveryConvention #32650
  • Fix T4 files for VS 17.8 #32651
  • Upgrade the snapshot when rolling back to a migration from a previous version #32690
  • Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32662
  • [release/8.0] Preserve unicodeness and fixed-lengthiness in compiled model. #32683
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32598
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32714
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32713
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Test for navigation naming from composite FK names #32711
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Visit inside InlineQueryRootExpression in nav expansion #32467
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2

Updated

  • Automatic use of C# primary constructors #32509

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Build Linux musl releases with -static-libgcc and -static-libstdc++ #18055

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18112

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #18111

  • Cloak spectre.console example file #18110

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #18106

Merged

  • Remove obsolete symreader dependency #18105
  • Define NetCurrent at VMR root #18102

  • Ignore IDE0044 for vstest #18100
